  • Uses of Mesh in camzup.core

    Subclasses of Mesh in camzup.core
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Mesh2
    Organizes data needed to draw a two dimensional shape using vertices and faces.
    class 
    Mesh3
    Organizes data needed to draw a three dimensional shape with vertices and faces.
    Methods in camzup.core that return Mesh
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Mesh
    Mesh.cycleFaces(int places)
    Cycles the array of indices in the faces array by a number of places.
    Mesh
    Mesh.cycleVerts(int faceIndex, int places)
    Cycles the array of indices in a face which indicate vertex (and therefore edge) order by a number of places.
    Mesh
    Mesh.reverseEdge(int i, int j)
    Flips the indices which specify an edge.
    Mesh
    Mesh.reverseFace(int i)
    Flips the indices which specify a face.
    Mesh
    Mesh.reverseFaces()
    Flips the indices which specify all faces.
    Mesh
    Mesh.setMaterialIndex(int i)
    Sets this mesh's material index.
    Mesh
    Mesh.triangulate()
    Triangulates all faces in a mesh by drawing diagonals from the face's first vertex to all non-adjacent vertices.
    Mesh
    Mesh.triangulate(int faceIndex)
    Triangulates a convex face by drawing diagonals from its first vertex to all non-adjacent vertices.
    Methods in camzup.core with parameters of type Mesh
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static Map<Integer,Integer>
    Mesh.auditFaceType(Mesh m)
    Counts the occurrence of faces with a given number of vertices.
    static boolean
    Mesh.isQuads(Mesh m)
    Evaluates whether all faces in a mesh are quadrilaterals.
    static boolean
    Mesh.isTriangles(Mesh m)
    Evaluates whether all faces in a mesh are triangles.
    static boolean
    Mesh.uniformVertsPerFace(Mesh m, int c)
    Evaluates whether all faces in a mesh have a specified number of vertices.
